features.title: Cover Story
features.description:
COVER: Premium Package

Cover Image and Story: Premium

Cover Image (Image Taken by Professional Photographer)

Professional Layout Design (with up to six images taken by photographer)

Premium Space in Middle of Magazine

Story (Max 1500 words. Client Interviewed and story professionally written)

Up to five clickable links and one QR code (website and SM platforms)

4 Highlighted Social Posts (Once a week on BLM Platform, 2 on Partner Platforms)

Framed 11 x 17 Image of Cover

COST: $2,200.00 + HST

Full Page + Advertorial

Professional Layout Design (with up to 4 images selected by Client)

Premium Space: End of Magazine / Last Story

Advertorial written about your business or special event (up to 500 words)

2 clickable link or QR code to website or social platform

2 highlighted social posts on BLM social platform

COST: $850 + HST ($650 for Ad + $200 Story)
